column1: # Title: Base Year Exogenous Shares for Selected Technologies
# Comments: Base year exogenous shares assigned to selected efficiency-partitioned technologies whose shares are not calculated from aggregate average efficiency.

column2: ~2009 edition. Lighting: https://www1.eere.energy.gov/buildings/publications/pdfs/ssl/lmc_vol1_final.pdf. All other technologies are not partitioned in the base year (i.e.
column3: all shares are allocated to the base technology).
